Reviews.Title: good cellphone
Reviews.Author: Jorge Campos
Reviews.Content: I did buy this product scared of i will get a bad product or something like that, but was in excellent conditionand I did send to my country Cuba and is working even in very remote area like La mensura pinares de mayari

Reviews.Title: Ok for texting and calling
Reviews.Author: klare r "klare"
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a smart phone then don't get this phone, this phone does not work as a smart phone. I tried to use the wifi, it will open the window then it will prompt that you have to have a wifi connection. This is only ok to use for calling or for texting. It seems this is manufacturers unlocked because the international sim card i have works fine, i hope it will also work fine during my trip.

Reviews.Title: Wifi does not work
Reviews.Author: 7 port usb squid hub
Reviews.Content: Phone advertised as a wifi but the wifi does not work or would not pick up wireless networks or would not accept passwords in order to connect.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel
Reviews.Content: great product, good handling an well package, came unlocked, so in venezuela i can used for all, except whatsapp, but doesnt a problem here, can used or sell to someone that need it.thank you!

Reviews.Title: New Phone
Reviews.Author: Wilbert Smith
Reviews.Content: I like the WiFi feature on this phone.  It is a great replacement that does not require carrying a data package. As long as they get the job done, i'll buy another and another and another

Reviews.Title: Not as advertized
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: Phone was used and not new as advertized. Never worked. Took it overseas and could not use it. It charged once then went dead. When I got back to the US and attempted to return, it was too late. Lost my money plus was inconvenienced by not having a phone on my trip. The seller is dishonest.

Reviews.Title: Two thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Raj Singh
Reviews.Content: Its an old style phone but reception is great better than my previous phone,,,product arrived intact,,,works great all over even in the elevator...

Reviews.Title: Excelent product an supplier
Reviews.Author: D. Mendible
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry arrives in excelent conditions, very fast and the supplier is very efficient.I recomend them a lot

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO
Reviews.Author: ELODIA CORDIDO
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE EQUIPO , TOTALMENTE NUEVO , LO LLEVE A MI TELEFONIA Y DE INMEDIATO FUE ACTIVADO SIN PROBLEMAS.. LO RECOMIENTO ALTAMENTE

ProductInfo.Features:
2.0-MP Camera Wi-Fi® Support
Featuring a metallic finish, clean lines and soft edges, the BlackBerry Curve 8320 smartphone is the smallest and lightest BlackBerry
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 8320 Unlocked GSM Smartphone - WiFi Support, QWERTY Keyboard, Speakerphone, Bluetooth, Instant Messaging, Silver
